DataListSpec.Name: Child Project Waiting List Children Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Data list to show a list of waiting list children on the child project page.
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CHILDPROJECT_CHILDRENLIST_WAITINGLIST( @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHILDLOOKUPID nvarchar(100) = null, @CHILDNAME nvarchar(200) = null ) as begin set nocount on;
declare @eligibilityCodeIneligible tinyint = 2 begin try declare @numberSponsorshipReasons tinyint -- The number of sponsorship reasons (waiting list and batch commit) that should be checked to include children with that sponsorship reason in the returned set of children set @numberSponsorshipReasons = 6
declare @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude table ( sponsorshipReasonID uniqueidentifier )
-- Waiting List reasons - finding these individually instead of all the start with 'Waiting List' in order to minimize accidental data entry issues insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'waiting list - market demand'
insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'waiting list - maximum quota reached'
insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'waiting list - not accepting new children'
insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'waiting list - project performance'
insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'waiting list - project status'
insert @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude select ID from SPONSORSHIPREASON where lower (REASON) = 'batch commit - lock failed'
-- Get the number of reasons inserted declare @reasonCount tinyint select @reasonCount = count(*) from @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude
if @reasonCount <> @numberSponsorshipReasons RAISERROR ('Could not find all of the waiting list reason ids', 16, 1) end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
select FIELDOFFICEID, so.ID SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, so.LOOKUPID CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME, ch_ext.DATEADDED, so_child.AGE, so_child.GENDER, dbo.UFN_DATE_FROMFUZZYDATE (so_child.BIRTHDATE) BIRTHDATE, sreason.REASON as WAITINGLISTREASON
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation ON slocation.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON sreason on so.SPONSORSHIPREASONID = sreason.id left join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext on so.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID
where FIELDOFFICEID = @CONTEXTID and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCodeIneligible and exists (select sponsorshipReasonID from @sponsorhipReasonsToInclude reasonstoinclude where reasonstoinclude.sponsorshipReasonID = so.SPONSORSHIPREASONID) and (@CHILDLOOKUPID is null or so.LOOKUPID like '%' + @CHILDLOOKUPID + '%') and (@CHILDNAME is null or so_child.NAME like '%' + @CHILDNAME + '%')
end
